resources.string: %s\thas booked to visit the above lodge
< Swipe right to upload lodge pictures >
We provide digital platform where geniune businesses and enterpreneur can engage their audience with their products and services.
Direct question pertaining to your personal temporary accommodation to our WhatsApp accommodation customer service and not in the WhatsApp group
Members are not allowed to make calls to customer service anytime, please tell your questions and problems directly, they can identify and answer back as soon as possible
The WhatsApp and Telegram group on this screen are the only groups which are officially authorized by RoaR, members should join at least one of the community groups to keep pace with other members.
Members should not believe any other platforms or links which are posted in our groups by some people who have an ulterior motive, you will bear the consequences of all such acts take if you do so.
Members should not make a payment to any account which is not belong to RoaR, please be aware of being defrauded.

The quality of customer service is one of the most foundation of RoaR, if anyone of the customer service hasn\'t served you well, please send feedback to complain about his or her service with their mobile number at Roar@gmail.com
No lodge has been added here yet.
